title: Exquisite Emerald and Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Bridal Masterpiece
materials: South Sea Pearl (Moti: 10.15 carats). Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Intricately crafted floral motifs are interspersed with emeralds and diamonds to form the classic Haaram design. The pendant features a mesmerizing peacock design with emerald accents. The gold work showcases impeccable filigree and openwork techniques, characteristic of South Indian jewelry. A pearl drop dangles from the pendant, adding a touch of elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant green emeralds
and the soft white luster of the pearl.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Suitable for adding a touch of royalty to any formal event.
description: This Haaram embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry artistry. The combination of emeralds and diamonds is considered auspicious and adds a touch of grandeur. The intricate design showcases exceptional craftsmanship, making it a true heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. A statement of elegance and traditional values.
